page.title: 05Moorside High School
page.content: Moorside High School is situated approximately 4 miles to the east of Stoke-On-Trent.The building consists of a large hall,a library,21 teaching classrooms,1 needlework room,2 art rooms,a music room,a commerce room and a gymnasium. Pupils can join Moorside at 11 or over but most of the youngsters arrive at 12 and go into the second year. At Moorside the children have to wear a uniform.The main colours are black, white,blue and grey.When pupils reach the sixth form they just have to be 'appropriately'dressed. Options have to be chosen in the 3rd year.There are 6,plus English Language, English Literature,P.E.and General Studies. There are different clubs that the pupils can go to including woodwork and computers.There are also Youth Clubs.
